verses.text: Ix tak'vi vinhaj Job chi' icha tik:
Tato smasanil in yaelal yet' in cusk'olal tik, tz'echtaj t'a yol junok echlab',
tecan ek'to yalil t'a yichanh yarenail sti' ha' mar, yuj chi' ix in comon alej icha tik.
Ha Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil, ichato ix och ch'apnaj sjul-lab' t'ayin, haxo svenenoal spucax t'a in nivanil. Toxo ix oymaj tas ay smay t'ayin yuj.
¿Tocval tz'ok' nok' caltacte'al b'uru tato ay yanh nok'? ¿Tocval tz'ok' nok' mam vacax tato ay tas sk'ux nok'?
¿Mach schi'an junok chib'il vail tato malaj yatz'amil? ¿Tocval wach' sloji saquil nok' nholob' tato malaj yatz'amil?
Icha chib'il vail malaj yatz'amil, icha chi' tas tzin chi ticnaic svab'i. Manhxalaj in gana in wa'i.
Comonoc tz'el t'a sk'ol Dios yak'an tas tzin k'an t'ay. Comonoc syak' tas tzin nib'ej.
Comonoc tz'el t'a sk'ol Dios chi' in sataneli, yic tzin lajviel t'a junelnhej.
Wach'chom svab' syail yuj in yaelal yet' in cusk'olal tik, palta tzin te tzalaji, yujto svak'nhej och sley Dios yipoc in k'ool, aton Dios Axonhej Ochi.
Manhxalaj vip svab'i yic svak'an techaj in yaelal tik, ¿tasxom yuj comon pitzan into?
¿Tocval lajan stzatzil in nivanil tik icha q'uen q'ueen? ¿Tocval icha stzatzil q'uen bronce stzatzil in b'ak'chil?
Maxtzac yal in colan in b'ha t'a yol vico'. Manhxa junok mach scolvaj ved'oc.
Ha junok mach ayoch t'a syaelal, wach'chom manhxa yelk'och Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil t'ay, palta smoj val tz'ak'ji snivanil sk'ol yuj eb' svach'k'ool.
Palta a ex tik ex vamigo, tonhej ix in e wach' juejeli. Lajan ex icha junok ha' eluma' stup t'a smelemal.
Ayic syak'an nhab' tat tz'aj sat ha' sb'eyi calan ha' yet' q'uen cheev, ma yet' q'uen sacb'acom.
Ayic tz'ulax q'uen cheev chi', stupem ha' eluma' chi', haxo yic tzovaj k'ak' stacjiem ha'.
Ha eb' anima b'eyum, sb'at eb' t'a titac b'e yic sayan ha' eb' yuq'uej, haxo tz'aji, satcanb'at eb' t'a lum taquinh lu'um chi', ata' schamcan eb'.
Ha eb' b'eyum anima aj chonhab' Temán yet' eb' aj Sabá, say ha ha' eb' yojtactaxon b'aj scani,
haxo yic sk'och eb' b'aj aytaxon ha' chi', taquinhxo yet'tal ha', toxonhej staccanq'ue sk'ol eb'.
Icha chi' eyaj t'ayin a ex tik, yujto ayic tzeyilanoch jantac in yaelal tik, tonhej tzex xivq'uei.
Palta a in tik, malaj tas tzin k'an t'ayex. Malaj tumin tzin k'an t'ayex yic tzin colchaji.
¿Tocval tzin k'an e colval yic tzin colchaj t'a yol sk'ab' jun ajk'ol t'ayin, ma t'a juntzanh eb' elk'um?
Hak'ek in k'ayb'ub'al, ol in cha vab' t'ayex. Ch'oxec och in mul chi' t'a in sat.
Malaj junok mach spaticanel junok pensar to wach', palta a ex tik, manhxa stzolal tas tzeyak'och t'a vib'anh.
Ha ex tik nab'anhej tzin e tumej, palta eyojtac to a slolonel junok mach ayoch t'a syaelal, ay b'aj malaj jab'oc yelk'ochi.
Ha ex tik, syal eyak'an e suerte t'a yib'anh eb' meb'a' ob'iltac. Syalpax e chonhanel junok eyamigo.
Ochanhec q'uelan t'a in sat, tato tonhej svesej.
Actejec eyalan juntzanh chi' t'a in patic. Comonoc tzeyojtaquejeli to yel juntzanh sval tik.
Ha e naani to esalvum in. Ha e naani to manh vojtacoc tas yel yet' tas manh yeloc.
